laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Decreased to 179.7 mg/dL at month 2, increased to 185.1 mg/dL at month 6, and decreased to 182.2 mg/dL at month 12.
Increased to 104.0 mg/dL at month 2, decreased slightly to 103.5 mg/dL at month 6, and increased to 108.2 mg/dL at month 12.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Normal levels before lamotrigine: 26 g/L (normal range: 18 to 36 g/L). After lamotrigine: IgG 4.3 g/L (normal range: 7.0 to 16.0 g/L); IgM 0.2 g/L (normal range: 0.4 to 2.5 g/L); IgA 0.3 g/L (normal range: 0.8 to 4.0 g/L).
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: In Dec 2001 levels returned to normal: IgG 8.0 g/L; IgM 0.5 g/L; IgA 0.4 g/L.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Impaired response to diphtheria (stimulation index: 1.5; normal range: >2).
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Follow-up tests showed improvement in other responses, but diphtheria response remained impaired.
